attributes.action: Remove the Right for a Pregnant Woman to urinate in a Policemans helmet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone agrees that this old Law is a insult to male police officers serving in England and Wales, plus this strange but rather disgusting old law has no place in todays modern Britain. Where damaging police property like a Male Police Constables Custodian or Bobby's Helmet as it is more commonly known, can be destroyed by a pregnant woman who is caught short in a public place.
